TEXT: He heard there was some gourmet bagels at the top of NL the spire, and god damn it, he is going to find them.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~cat,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
